Clipper: The Race Of Their Lives (Ep5)
Clipper: The Race Of Their Lives (Ep5)
Numinous: A Ski Film
programme.desc: He is one of the most aggressive and talented freeskiers of our age. Born and raised in the BC backcountry, with a bloodline alive with adventure and a style carved from the landscape itself, Kye Petersen is about to blow the doors off of big mountain skiing. Numinous explores the relationships and connections with the natural world that are necessary to safely dance with mountain faces covered in snow.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: Backpacking Uganda Part 2
programme.desc: Showcasing the people, places and adventures that surround the world’s top backpacking trails, Epic Trails is an exciting and inspiring adventure travel series hosted by Eric Hanson. An avid backpacker, knowledgeable wilderness explorer and passionate adventurer, Eric has a strong presence in the online backpacking community and shares his adventures in an approachable and inspirational way.

programme.title: CLIMB
programme.desc: Santa Barbara triathlete Neil Myers was nearly killed in a horrific training accident on Gibraltar Road in 2018. One week after the accident, he signed up to compete in a triathlon that was a year away, with a goal of simply crossing the finish line. Four months after healing and leaving rehab, Neil began his cycling training. Only one year after the accident, he surpassed the goal he had set while he was in the hospital. He and his team won the 2019 Santa Barbara Triathlon.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking the 1000 Islands
programme.desc: The crystal-clear waters of Lake Ontario are home to a spectacular group of islands known as the 1000 Islands – and there’s 1000 good reasons to visit. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores the must-see local paddling spots by sea kayak.

programme.title: Solving for Z | A Calculus of Risk
programme.desc: How much can we gain from the mountains? How much can we lose? Between our own perceptions and the reality of the hazards, how much space exists? And in that gap, how do we decide what we are willing to risk? Solving for Z explores IFMGA guide and father Zahan Billimoria’s relationship to the intoxicating highs and crushing blows of a life in the high-consequence environment of big mountain skiing.

programme.title: Pathfinder
programme.desc: Life Beyond Fear. Pathfinder is a tale about the human spirit.The film follows six world-class slackliners (Highliners) on a mission deep into the Norwegian mountains to attempt something that’s never been seen before: Walking a thin line, elevated in the vastness between two colossal cliffs, illuminated only by the mystical northern lights.

programme.title: The Dream Factory
programme.desc: Join TGR's all-star athlete team as they travel the globe in search of deep snow, steep lines, and gnarly cliffs and couloirs on which to push the limits of skiing and snowboarding.

programme.title: QUACKERZ
programme.desc: A conflict between local Ducks and the Military Mallards who land on the _East __Asian Island, mistaking it for Hawaii. While the fathers fight and argue, Longway, the_ _Emperor`s son, and Erica, the commander`s daughter, meet and become friends. The kids must ally all the ducks to battle their foe, the daunting Ms. Knout, who seeks to_ _destroy the sun.

programme.title: TRANSMIGRATION
programme.desc: Curtis (Andrew Treglia), an American looking for an escape to a foreign land, joins his estranged Brazilian biologist brother Francis (Giovanni Arajo) on a spontaneous journey to find a rare jungle beetle in the Amazon. While hiking, Curtis is bitten by a snake. As he enters a venom induced hallucinogenic dream the two brothers are captured as slaves by a fantasy tribe of Amazonian women, and given to the tribal queen (Fernanda Santana). With the aid of another slave (Pericles Anarcos), Curtis must plot a rescue of Francis and their escape, unless he finds his new situation better than the life he left behind.

programme.title: DISCIPLINE
programme.desc: A series of murders are confounding the local police with its residue of mutilated corpses. It begins when a sadistic cult murders willing victims for entertainment. Professor Lafitte, a rich sophisticated man, whose hobby is collecting souls, leads the cult. One of his students is Jack, brilliant and obsessed with composing avant-grade music. He decides to compose a concerto for synthesizer & samplers that is based on the recorded sound of human screams. Jack is drawn into the clutches of the professor, who is guiding him into a dark path of self discovery, in his attempt to create a new kind of music. In his quest for this new kind of music, he begins to seek out human pain. The professor leads Jack into his much more dangerous private activities. Jacks girlfriend Claudia and his best friend Benny are journalists for the collage newspaper and are covering a series of bizarre murders and mutilations that has the police stumped. Benny finally discovers that there is a connection between the murders, the professor and Jack, just as Jack and Professor Lafiette and his diabolical servants are threatening Claudias lives. The final scene threatens not only Jacks creativity, but also his very life.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 4
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: Prince Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy discovers that he may be next in line to the throne of a tiny faraway country – and he takes a crash-course in ‘how to be royal’... with ‘crash’ being the key word!

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: ATHITHI DEVO BHAVA
programme.desc: Chai Raja has taught Sundar a valuable lesson that customers are like god. Cashing on this opportunity Basha walks into the hotel pretending to be a customer. Basha comes into the shop in all kind of disguises dressed like a pot-bellied Carnatic singer soon caught by Sundar, as a suited up officer soon caught by Sundar and at last as a sadhu making Sundar do all sorts of silly and insane chores/services. At last when the customer asks Sundar to massage his limbs, Sundar finds a peculiar fifth leg (Bashas tail) which makes Sundar lose all control and he goes mad. It is sheer madness in the teashop.

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: Easter Bunny
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: The Violinist
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old violin and, on discovering that he’s a distant descendant famous musician of “Gummy Stradi-bear-ius”, he starts playing the violin non-stop... driving everyone around him completely nuts.

programme.title: TRUNK CALL
programme.desc: Its a festival day and one of Chai Rajas customers has brought in a giant tusker who he parks outside the stall. But it is at the very same time that Sundar and Basha are steeped in a blind chase- a pan comes flying and knocks the customer out. As others carry him off for some first aid, Chai Raja entrusts the elephant in Sundars care. Sundar is intimidated by the animal has no choice but to accept. Inquisitive Basha meanwhile discovers that the tusker is in fact nothing but a gentle giant Basha strikes a plan to use Sundars fear of the animal to lay hands on extra banana-fries. As Sundarworks , he spots the tuskers trunk snake in and suck in banana fritters. He jumps to confront the animal but comes up nose against the pointed tusks. And so the fritters keep disappearing, until Sundar spots Basha hi-fiving the tusker. Furious, Sundar decides to teach the both of them a lesson and rigs a watery trap to drench Basha and the tusker, but the trap malfunctions and it all ends in the massive tusker, sliding behind first ramming into the stall and the tea shop board reads Hotel Cali Torn- Ia!

programme.title: BE QUIET!
programme.desc: The Guardians travel to Anjing Island to retrieve Maestro Meow’s drum from the island’s ogre, who HATES noise of any kind. But the ogre steals Pai’s voice! Will he get it back in time to sing at tonight’s Good Luck Concert?

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: The Golden Fish
programme.desc: Fisherman GoGo catches the scarce golden fish, I-Go, but frees her. To repay for GoGos kindness, I-Go promises to grant his wishes, and Gogo wishes his greedy wife, WI-Gos longing to be rich.

programme.title: Smighty Jam
programme.desc: Nardy doesnt believe he will ever be a good athlete, but Zap teaches him to trust his instincts and use Smighty Basketball skills to stop the villains from stealing the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Hamster in the House.
programme.desc: Friendly and lovable ‘mad scientist’ Granny Peters accidentally transforms her cute little pet hamster.... into a not-so-cute HUGE pet hamster – and things get interesting when it escapes and decides to move into Gummy’s place uninvited.

programme.title: All Aboard
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Orders up
programme.desc: Business is good and Chai Raja is grinning wider with each ring of the cash register. His mood gets a further lift as a guy in a black suit (an agent) enters with a briefcase marked Top Secret. As Sundar delivers tea to the agent, he is intrigued by the briefcase. Basha chooses to make off with the snacks of the customer at the adjacent table at that very minute. Sundar leaps at Basha and in his hurry upsets the agents plate and tea, knocking down the briefcase. Chai Raja is immediately at agents side, apologizing- he absently picks the briefcase back up(not noticing a fallen plate-like device) and gives it to the agent. The annoyed agent leaves and Sundar gets extra chores as punishment. Basha cant help taunt Sundar as he is stuck doing the chores- In a fit of anger, Sundar chases Basha back into the hotel and randomly hurls the plate like device. Before the chase can continue though, Sundar is sharply reprimanded and hauled off by Chai Raja. Basha meanwhile finds the object that Sundar had just thrown a tad bizarre and pokes around. Lo! It turns out to be a gadget that can make just about anything levitate! Chuckling impishly, Basha sets off towards the hotel, gadget at ready intent on helping Sundar get every order UP! The chaos gets out of hand when Basha sends the device into overdrive and is himself lifted off and bounced around. In the end however, the agent returns and reclaims the device much to the relief of all who drop back down.

programme.title: SPACE INVADER
programme.desc: Krackleflint is back with the latest and greatest diabolical offering from Krackleflint Industries Inc.

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: TEA TO TANGO
programme.desc: Basha arrives at the hotel ready to stack up his belly with fritters, but the said organ of his flips like a pancake when he sees the most bewitching of female primates sitting with her owner at Chai Rajas tea shop. Basha is all set to sweep her off her dainty hairy feet but minutes before that Sundar, fumbling one of his deliveries trips on Chai Rajas new jackfruit dessert and ends up doing a complicated tappangutthumove ; which as fate would have it sits absolutely in tune with the music that played on the radio. The female monkey who until now looked comatose jerks to rapturous attention. She cant take her eyes off Sundar. Basha horrified at this unexpected attention-switch tries some classy Tango to woo her. Sundar though slightly irritated by the fawning female monkey, is amused at Bashas frustration there begins an impromptu dance off between Sundar and Basha. Sadly for Basha, all the suave leaps and twists dont seem to impress the damsel of his dreams. Sundar too is in danger of facing flak from Chai Raja for delivering more tappangutthuthan tea! Sundar knowingly trips up letting Basha win the affections of the lady finally...and a pleasant surprise from Basha awaits Sundar as he drags feet to wash the dishes!

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: To complete the next step on her Mondojitsu Path, April has to master the dance of the falcon. Since Xia won’t help because he’s too embarrassed to dance with her, April accepts the assistance of Mei, who turns out to be a great dancer. While they’re distracted, Negu sends Amkko and Koto to steal the Glove of the North, but Mei, who feels appreciated for the first time in his life, helps April to win it back.

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: Muffin Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is out of town and Dunky is really up and grooming himself in the mirror and cleaning the house. He has made a special gajar ka halwa but quickly hides it from Keet and Cat.

programme.title: The Big Wave
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs set off a Smightynami wave that threatens to wash away Smightyland. Dude has to ride the big one and save the day.

programme.title: Cuppa Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: Two Tickets.
programme.desc: When Gummy wins two tickets to a big dance show, each of his best pals vie to be the one he gives the coveted second ticket to.

programme.title: The Heroes Path
programme.desc: Xia is bored because it’s been days since Negu sent a Mutant when he finds the instructions for the “Heroes’ Path”. Pai and April laugh at what they think is a silly game for kids, but Xia completes each step with great excitement. When one of the instructions is to steal the Glove of the North, Xia begins to suspect something. Thanks to his quick wits he manages to save the Glove of the North and find out who was behind the “Heroes’ Path” – a mutant fox, sent by Negu.

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: Whoops Elujah
programme.desc: When Ene messes up building a playset, it turns out to be even more fun than the original, Pancake learns a lesson about “When the world gives you lemons....”. Mistakes are just unexpected surprises.

programme.title: The Big Cleanup!
programme.desc: It’s a messy affair. Floors covered with mud, walls with cake splattered and filth in every nook and cranny. Don sweeps, mops, vacuums and leaves the house sparkling new but when he returns back after throwing the trash, the house is again bombarded with dirt! This goes on till Don and Colonel pack their bags and decide to leave the house. Will they ever return?

programme.title: Silly Cat
programme.desc: Cat does nothing but just watches tv and lazes on the sofa. And has messed up the tv room with spilled water and popcorn and all things upside down.

programme.title: Three's A Pain
programme.desc: When Pancake, Odessa, and Maple end up getting into a tiff over some colored chalk they’re using to draw pictures with, they ALL wind up in the Zooniverse at the same time that night! Sharing is caring. / Teamwork is the way.

programme.title: “Moo”-Ing Trouble!
programme.desc: Help! There is a cow in the bathroom this time, and he is on a mad eating spree, happily mooing away soap bubbles too!Don & Colonel try in vain to get rid of the cow but the three mice seem to have a different agenda. To make matters worse, a bull has made its grand entry into the scene too

programme.title: A new nose
programme.desc: The twins use a flashlight to solve a problem for a self-conscious little snowman.

programme.title: This Is Speed Racer
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: The Secrets of the Engine
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: You Can Leave Your Hat Off
programme.desc: When Odessa doesnt want to get rid of her old coat, now to small, because shes had it forever (and is a little afraid of change), but when she ends up helping Ene find a hat, she learns that change isnt something to be afraid, but something to be embraced. Change can be good

programme.title: Brother Sun and Sister Moon
programme.desc: Late night, GoGo and I-Go wait for their mother who’s at the market selling rice cakes. Meanwhile, her mother gets eaten by a tiger whom disguises as her mother and makes his way to the siblings.

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: BADminton
programme.desc: Marco & Polo are playing badminton in the backyard like a sweet family. Then the shuttle cock falls on Cats head as he is about to catch Keet.

programme.title: Heungboo and Nolboo
programme.desc: Mischievous UGo takes all of his parents property and kicks his younger brother GoGo out of the house. Meanwhile, a swallow bird brings a gourd seed to the eaves of a kind-hearted GoGo house, and soon, gourds containing gold and silver treasures opens on the roof of the GoGos house.

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: The Deep Freeze
programme.desc: After not following the steps to find Odessas hidden treasure, a frustrated Pancake enters the Zooniverse to find it covered in ice and snow. To "turn back on" Mt Zoonihorn, he must follow the steps and learn from his friends mistakes. Determination and following the correct steps can lead to success.

programme.title: Hi Five
programme.desc: Pancake splits off four copies of himself, which makes trying to catch them five times more difficult! And he’s having trouble counting that high. Always keep trying/resilience to failure.

programme.title: Ant Attack!
programme.desc: It is a usual day in the house with the war between the dogs and the rats. And there is a new group. In fact an army of enemies – ants! And they make the life in the house a living hell. For the first time Don , Colonel and the rat trio get a real taste of the bad ants.

programme.title: Mood Music
programme.desc: Deedee and Nino hear the most horrible sounds ever and run out to find Mewmew playing his violin. And to top it off he’s inviting everyone to hear him play at the concert. Deedee encourages Mewmew along, but everyone turns her down after hearing what Mewmew plays. Tiggy throws a shoe at Mewmew mistaking the music for cats screeching, even the Doobydoos scram. Tika Pila is also enraged that Mewmew walks away so dejected. Deedee weaves a spell that makes the violin plays with so much emotion that Nino sheds a tear. Now Mewmew has to muster her spirit and prove to all of Abra-Dabra that she can really play well. First stop is at Tiggy’s, and when Mewmew plays a melancholic tune, Tiggy cries so much that Mewmew walks away sadly. The Doobydoos cry as well to the point that Mewmew totally hates what Deedee has conjured. Deedee and Nino notice that Mewmew’s violin plays according to the state of Mewmew’s emotions. Deedee and Nino devise a plan and Nino keeps Mewmew happy and practising while Deedee rounds up the townsfolk to attend the concert. Charlie goes to get the twins, but takes a quick nap instead. Though all take a while to come, Deedee and Nino lift Mewmew’s spirits so high that the entire town come rushing to the concert on hearing the joyful music Mewmew is playing. And even thought the magic spell wears off, the town still encourage Mewmew to keep on playing, for she had already proved the very best to all of them.

programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: The Fat Worm - Thumbelina
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of THUMBELINA, by Hans Christian Andersen. On this occasion, they have not been called out to solve a case, but rather to be guests at the wedding of CORNELIUS, the prince of the Land of Flowers, who is getting married to THUMBELINA. But not long after arriving in this idyllic place, inhabited by tiny fairies and imps, SANDRA and FO have to set to work as usual, as a bird from the distant frozen climes of Sereland kidnaps THUMBELINA, before the wedding. SANDRA and FO travel to Sereland, discover THUMBELINA’s whereabouts and rescue her from MR. MOLE, a rich, powerful, blind mole, who is still in love with the voice of sweet little

programme.title: PAI THE WIZARD
programme.desc: Discouraged with cleaning Maestro Meow’s humble hut, Pai uses the Elder’s conch horn (which Pai thinks is magic) to summon what he thinks are “Cleaner Birds.” But they prove to be Party Birds, and soon have overrun the Westerly Breeze!

programme.title: Knot My Problem
programme.desc: Maple keeps forgetting how to tie her shoes until Promi shows her a way to remember. Practice makes perfect, and perseverance leads to achievement.

programme.title: Spooktacular.
programme.desc: The gang is ‘haunted’ by a mystery spook – and sets out to overcome their collective fear and get to the bottom of the scary mystery.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: Dancing Boots
programme.desc: There are a pair of boots in the window of the Fortune Tellers shop and theyre not for sale as theyre enchanted. Hoping that the boots will give him wonderful powers, Aladdin slips them on and finds himself dancing. Its funny and he loves it, until he tries to stop and cant and so out he dances into the street. Jamillah runs for Genie and together they find some tricky, funny way to waylay Aladdin and remove the boots.

programme.title: Pool Off
programme.desc: Ever seen sharks in a swimming pool? The Rat-a-tat swimming pool has many such surprises including grenades, sharks and weights! Watch Colonel twist and turn to woo a hottie.

programme.title: Coco Jumbo
programme.desc: It’s the time of the month when the coconuts from the trees have to be removed to be send the market for sale. GrandPA has entrusted Dunky to do this job.

programme.title: The Jokester
programme.desc: Zaps silly pranks on his friends go too far and he finds himself all alone to fight Sneevil. A hilarious dance off between Zap and Biggs will determine who will get control of the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Moon Charmer
programme.desc: Samir the local snake charmer is trying unsuccessfully to charm a snake out of his basket and the market is growing restless until Jamillah arrives and all of the market is in awe! When she explains where she comes from Samir is thrilled and asks her to accompany him to see a rare astrological site, a blood moon. But its a sight best seen from above and the greatest viewing spots are outside the city gates which are locked at night not to mention the law expressly forbidding anyone to leave. When they try to leave via a secret door a guard catches them, but just when all hope seems lost Jamillah has an idea - the magic carpet! And with that they take off into a night sky filled with a big red moon.

programme.title: Smelly Princess
programme.desc: Brains must protect a space princess who has the ability to bend people to her will using her scent. While her political enemies try to steal her away, she tries to prove herself worthy of being a Protector.

programme.title: Die Laughing - The Emperor’s New Clothes
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of “The Emperor’s New Clothes”, having been called out by the father of HANS, a 5-year-old boy. HANS has gone missing during the parade in which the EMPEROR wore his new clothes for the first time in public. SANDRA discovers that HANS is, in fact, the little boy who laughs when he sees the EMPEROR in his underwear, thus revealing the obvious truth that no one dared mention: the Emperor has no clothes on. The detective will also discover that Rufus, the Emperor’s bitter, resentful jester, is behind the disappearance of HANS.

programme.title: STICKY SITUATION
programme.desc: Having used his Mystic Stick to defeat a giant beaver, Pai loves his weapon more than ever. Spying, Negu gets an idea. The Guardians’ and the Elders’ possessions start to go missing, and they keep being tricked. A mysterious expert declares the culprit to be…Pai’s stick! But just as Xia’s about to burn the stick, it turns into a mutant Stick Insect sent by Negu! The Guardians battle the mutant and defeat it using Pai’s beloved stick.

programme.title: The Incredible Shrinking Gummy.
programme.desc: A weird gizmo in Granny Peters’ lab winds up shrinking Gummy down to a tiny size, and he must cope with a suddenly-HUGE world... while trying to contact pals Harry and Kala and figure out some way to get back to normal.

programme.title: Mango Season
programme.desc: It’s the mango season and Dunky has to guard all the mangoes so that no one will steal them. He has taken the help of Cat and Keet to guard them from Hoodie and the mean cat gang.

programme.title: Baby Sitting
programme.desc: It’s the summer holidays. GrandPA’s daughter is visiting her dad from the neighboring town with her year old baby.

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: Rainbow Show
programme.desc: Its the day of the Extreme Glow Rainbow. Zip wants to prove shes her own Smighty without her twin brother, Zap, so she grabs hold of the Air Stone which she cannot control. The Air region twists and turns and the Smighties need to be saved from the Villains trap.

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: Don't Knock It Till You Have Built It
programme.desc: When Valeo breaks a hole from the Zooniverse INTO Pancake’s room, a swarm of Splutterbies enter as well, destroying Pancake’s house! Put yourself in someone else’s place to see how your actions might affect them and never give up in trying to accomplish your goals.

programme.title: Mister Perfect
programme.desc: Nora is so impressed with Eddie’s philanthropic music concert, Fred uses Friday to trick Eddie into letting him headline the show.

programme.title: King Of The Sewer Bears
programme.desc: Fred should not have played with his Dad’s trophy soccer ball, so when it falls into the sewer drain, Fred and Friday go find it. They encounter an ancient race of “sewer bears” who make Fred their king, before making him their dinner.

programme.title: Chill Out
programme.desc: A hot summer afternoon. The fan has stopped working and the ice trays are empty, and who could be responsible for putting Don through all this sweat! Mottu Lambu and Chottu giggle as they watch Don spinning along with the fan, getting frozen inside a locked deep freezer. Colonel is all set to rescue Don, but will he succeed?

programme.title: Friendfest Festival
programme.desc: Friendfest is about to be ruined when the Smighties get the Switcherozee Surprise from the Villains and switch personalities. They get the ultimate lesson in friendship when theyl learn to appreciate each other and defeat Sneevil and Biggs.

programme.title: Aquí viene la novia
programme.desc: Para ayudar a su padre, Irina acepta organizar la boda de Juliana, pero descubre que el novio es su ex.

programme.title: Aquí viene la novia
programme.desc: Para ayudar a su padre, Irina acepta organizar la boda de Juliana, pero descubre que el novio es su ex.

programme.title: Una carta de esperanza
programme.desc: Ana decide entregar a la niña recién nacida de su hija Bárbara a un orfanato y ocultarle la verdad a su hija.

programme.title: Una carta de esperanza
programme.desc: Ana decide entregar a la niña recién nacida de su hija Bárbara a un orfanato y ocultarle la verdad a su hija.

programme.title: Una carta de esperanza
programme.desc: Ana decide entregar a la niña recién nacida de su hija Bárbara a un orfanato y ocultarle la verdad a su hija.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.desc: Director: Ala cream - Cast: Hussein Fahmy - Raghda / - Year of production:

programme.title: El Hob El Daye
programme.desc: Director: Barakaat - Cast: Soad Hossni / Roshdy Abazza - Year of production: 1970

programme.title: Azmet Sharaf
programme.desc: Director: Waleid El Tabei - Cast: Gada Abd El Razk / Ahmed Fahmi- Year of production: 2009

programme.title: Mafesh Faeda
programme.desc: Director:Hatem Farid- Cast:Ahmed Malik - Mostafa Amar Year of production:2004

programme.title: Rad Fael
programme.desc: Director: Hossam El Gohary - Cast:Mahmoud Abdel El Mogne -Houria Farghali / - Year of production: 2012

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: SuperDad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Happy Vibes

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: Noah's Ark 1959
programme.desc: Noah gets the word: build an ark in seven days. His sons cut the necessary trees in three days, and much furious sawing and hammering follows. But there's no rest, as they need to round up all the animals. Noah boards the animals, then his sons, their wives, and his wife (who packed a ferocious picnic). The rains and flood begin. The animals soon develop cabin fever and get restless, but Mrs. Noah has the answer: "Music has charms to soothe the savage beast." His sons find instruments and begin playing; everyone dances. But Harry the hippo dances with everyone but his wife; Noah goes to her, and while she tells him not to mention Harry's name, Noah convinces her that Harry is thinking only of her. The rains end; Noah sends a dove out who brings back an olive branch. They land on Mount Ararat and disembark.

programme.title: Who Saw The Men In Black
Guest Joshua Rothman
programme.desc: Slavery is America's dirty little secret, which is why there's so many misconceptions and misinformation that's in history books and circling around society today. The hierarchy of slavery, the business that it took to make it work and become successful, and the slave societies that thrived as a result of it are all not often talked about. Listen in to a fascinating conversation with Joshua Rothman, author and professor at the University of Alabama, that starts with the origins of slavery, to the ships, and then to the plantation. Regardless of which part you look at, a slave trader was involved every step of the way.

programme.title: Guest Chef Nina Compton
programme.desc: Nina Compton is an amazing chef who has won a James Beard award who is running Compere Lapin in New Orleans. Awesome conversation with a legendary chef.

programme.title: Guest Eric Hall
programme.desc: Singer-songwriter Eric Hall talks new music, touring with Beyonce and Mary J. Blige, and the current state of the music industry.

programme.title: New Number Same Name
programme.desc: If you’re looking at what’s next and feeling nervous, remember this: What God has done in your life is only the foundation, not the finish line. He’s a creative God, still at work in ways you’re not expecting. Let go of your plan so God can show you His purpose.

programme.title: It's Not Over
programme.desc: Things really can change for you. Your past is not your prophecy. Stop allowing fear to predict your future, and begin to see it how God sees it. Pastor Jabin Chavez encourages us: “It’s Not Over.”

programme.title: Who You Talking To?
programme.desc: What conversation are you having with yourself? Pastor Robert Madu equips us with strategy to prioritize God’s voice in the face of conflict in “Who You Talking To?”

programme.title: The Power Of A Place
programme.desc: The right place has the power to help us thrive and grow. Jonathan Josephs shows us how God uses our environment to fulfill His great purpose in “The Power Of A Place.”
